    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayableGameController

        public PlayableGameController(int size)
        Initializes a new checkers board, and populates each side's pieces. Handles piece hints when a piece is selected.
        Parameters:
        size - Number of squares the board will have in both an x and y axis
        See Also:
        BoardController

    • Method Detail

        Adds a piece's hints to the panel when a user selects a piece.
        Parameters:
        piece - The selected piece
